make([]uint64, 0) for _, v := range die { sDie = append(sDie, ret[v]...) } for _, v := range live { sLive = append(sLive, ret[v]...) } inArray := func(i uint64, arr []uint64) bool { for _, v := range ListsUnordered Create a list by starting a line with +, -, or * Sub-lists are made by indenting 2 spaces: Marker character change forces new list start: Ac tristique libero volutpat at Facilisis in pretium nisl aliquet Nulla volutpat aliquam velit Very easy! Ordered Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet Consectetur adipiscing elit Integer molestie lorem at massa You can use sequential numbersâ€¦ â€¦or keep all the numbers as 1. Start numbering with offset: foo bar CodeInline code Indented code 1234// Some commentsline 1 of codeline 2 of codeline 3 of code Block code â€œfencesâ€ 1Sample text here...
